entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of ice pellets early in the morning and with periods of rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
